memberdef.name: ZB_ERROR_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: do { \ const uint32_t LOCAL_ERR_CODE = (uint32_t) (-ERR_CODE); \ if (LOCAL_ERR_CODE != RET_OK) { \ LOG_ERR("ERROR %u [%s] at %s:%u", \ LOCAL_ERR_CODE, \ zb_error_to_string_get(LOCAL_ERR_CODE), \ __FILE__, \ __LINE__); \ k_fatal_halt(K_ERR_KERNEL_PANIC); \ } \ } while (0)

briefdescription.para: Macro for calling the error handler function if the supplied ZBOSS return code is different than RET_OK.

parameterdescription.para: Error code supplied to the error handler.

memberdef.name: ZB_COMM_STATUS_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (COMM_STATUS != ZB_TRUE) { \ LOG_ERR("Unable to start BDB commissioning at %s:%u", \ __FILE__, \ __LINE__); \ ZB_ERROR_CHECK(RET_ERROR); \ } \ } while (0)

briefdescription.para: Macro for calling the error handler function if the return code for bdb_start_top_level_commissioning indicates that the BDB procedure did not succeed.

parameterdescription.para: Value returned by the bdb_start_top_level_commissioning function.

briefdescription.para: This file defines the error handler utilities for ZBOSS error codes.
